Enumeration Type Documentation

enum wapi_txpower_flag_t

Transmit power (txpower) flags.

Enumerator:
WAPI_TXPOWER_DBM 

Value is in dBm.

WAPI_TXPOWER_MWATT 

Value is in mW.

WAPI_TXPOWER_RELATIVE 

Value is in arbitrary units.
